name: credible_uncertain_post
description: checks the post and flags as credible uncertain
condition: post.veracity_unverified > 0.5 && post.veracity_stance_support < 0.8 && post.veracity_stance_comment >0.5 && post.misinfome_credibility_value > -0.33 && post.misinfome_credibility_value <= 0.33 && post.misinfome_credibility_confidence > 0.5
